scripts.build:renderer: cd ../../../renderers/web_core && npm install && npm run build && cd ../lit && npm install && npm run build
scripts.demo:all: npm install && npm run build:renderer && concurrently -k -n "SHELL,REST,CONT1" -c "magenta,blue,green" "npm run serve:shell" "npm run serve:agent:restaurant" "npm run serve:agent:contact_lookup"
